feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023
